total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the locations of the number 2 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the pattern of the number 2 in the input grid.
Q3: Identify the smallest rectangle that can contain the pattern.
Q4: Crop the input grid to the size of the rectangle identified in Q3.
Q5: Identify any additional transformations required to match the pattern in the example outputs (e.g., rotation, reflection).
